input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL CENTER OF THE JELENIA GORA VALLEY. Summary: Delivery and Launch of Solutions Enabling Physical Segmentation of Servers and Edge Devices. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery and launch of solutions enabling the physical segmentation of servers for the Provincial Hospital Center of the Jelenia Gora Valley in Jelenia Gora, in accordance with Annex No. 1 to the SWZ - Description of the Subject of the Order. The subject of the order includes design together with the installation, delivery and commissioning of solutions enabling the physical segmentation of servers and edge devices in order to increase the security and efficiency of the network and server infrastructure. The designed solution is intended to provide physical segmentation allowing for isolation critical IT resources, which minimizes the risk of spreading potential cyber threats and limits unauthorized users' access to sensitive data. In order to implement the physical segmentation of servers and edge devices, the Ordering Party allows the preparation of a second one server room in a container building. The final date for completion of deliveries and order fulfillment cannot be later than May 15, 2026.<br> Delivery and launch of solutions enabling physical segmentation of servers<br> and edge devices<br> Doc Title: Delivery and launch of enabling solutions physical segmentation of servers and edge devices<br> Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Order for the Supply of a Container Station for Water Treatment and Disinfection. Description: The scope of the order, i.e. delivery of a container station for water treatment and disinfection, includes:<br> I. Delivery of a container water treatment station with a filtration module:<br> 1) The device should be intended for the treatment of drinking water from surface sources and for the treatment of contaminated tap water in the event of a crisis;<br> 2)The device is brand new;<br> 3) Device powered by 230 V mains with the possibility of connecting to an external power source, e.g. a power generator;<br> 4) Minimum device capacity 5,000 l/h (5 m3/h);<br> 5)The device should be built-in in a container with a compact structure that can be moved;<br> 6) Storage container with dimensions of at least 2991 mm x 2438 mm x 2591 mm, double-leaf doors with a surrounding rubber seal, frame structure - at least welded steel profiles with a thickness of 2 or 3 mm;<br> 7) Possibility of operation of the device and operation in unfavorable weather conditions;<br> 8) Purification technology should be carried out using ecological processes, which will mainly use air and electricity;<br> 9) Purified water should be fit for consumption in accordance with the regulation Minister of Health of December 7, 2017 on the quality of water intended for human consumption;<br> Delivery of 2 pieces of mobile container station intended for decontamination and water production from bacteriologically contaminated water:<br> 1)The device must meet the conditions for washing and fog.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MYSZKOW COUNTY REPRESENTED BY THE COUNTY BOARD IN MYSZKOW. Summary: Mobile Water Treatment Plant and Packaging Device. Description: Mobile water treatment plant: The subject of the order is the delivery of a brand new, complete mobile water treatment device (a set of devices enabling water treatment and disinfection) in field conditions, for the needs of population protection and civil defense in Myszkow County. Ordering party allows equivalent solutions with parameters no worse than those indicated below, meeting technical, functional and quality requirements. Delivery of a mobile water treatment plant with a complete set of devices enabling the treatment and disinfection of water in field conditions for the needs of population protection and civil defense in the Myszkow district. Subject of the order includes purchase, delivery, unloading, installation and commissioning - depending on the need. The Contractor undertakes to deliver the subject of the order to the Ordering Party, using its own transport and at its own expense, to the place designated by the Ordering Party. A detailed description of the subject of the order (OPZ) is attached as Annex A to SWZ.

Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of two GNSS RTK smart antenna sets with an LTE controller, equipped with tilt compensation (IMU), a measurement camera and field and office software.1. Technical requirements Tilt compensation (IMU): no calibration, immune to magnetic interference, unlimited pole deflection angle, while maintaining the defined measurement accuracy. Additional measurement uncertainty with compensation not worse than 5 mm + 0.4 mm/. Measuring camera: allows you to measure points in photos (accuracy not worse than 4 cm at a distance of 10 m); possibility of creating point clouds in office software. Kanay and systems: min. 555 kanaw; GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, BeiDou, QZSS, NavIC, SBAS, L-Band (PPP/RTK bridging) support. Accurate RTK (ISO 17123-8): - single baseline: H 8 mm + 1 ppm, V 15 mm + 1 ppm - network RTK: H 8 mm + 0.5 ppm, V 15 mm + 0.5 ppm RTK initialization time: typical 4 s. PPP: full convergence 10 min, reconvergence RTK bridging: maintaining the solution min. 10 min with no corrections. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of a brand new backhoe loader, manufactured no earlier than 2025, meeting Euro Stage V exhaust emission standards. The machine is to be fully equipped, ready for operation, with technical and operational parameters not worse than those specified in the detailed description of the item. orders.The backhoe loader should have a modern diesel engine with a power of min. 110 HP, automatic gearbox, high-performance hydraulic system and telescopic excavator arms and multi-function loader bucket. The operator's cabin must meet ROPS/FOPS standards and ensure comfort and safety work and be equipped with a heated seat and LED lighting. The order includes delivery of the machine to the Ordering Party's headquarters, training of operators in the use of the equipment and provision of authorized service at a distance of no more than 100 km. The offered equipment must have a CE Declaration of Conformity to be covered by minimum 24-month warranty and meets all requirements specified in the SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Summary: Delivery and Installation of a Brand New Automatic Drinking Water Packaging Machine Equipped with a Device for Disinfecting Water and Foil with Uv Rays Along with a Supply of Foil for Packaging Drinking Water. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KOŁOBRZEG COMMUNE. Summary: Construction of a Complex of Sports Fields in Zieleniewo. Description: The subject of the order is the execution of construction works consisting in the construction of a complex of sports fields with the necessary infrastructure (including installation of rainwater drainage and external lighting), which constitutes the first stage of the project. The task will be carried out at ul. Jaboniowa in Zieleniewo for plot no. 131/54 and includes the construction of two pitches, i.e. a football pitch with an artificial grass surface and a multi-purpose pitch with a polyurethane surface, as well as the construction of a skate park, which will be located in the immediate vicinity of the existing building with sports and recreational facilities serving as common room. In addition, the subject of the order includes the construction of new parking spaces and fencing of the area.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. In addition, the subject of the order includes the construction of new parking spaces and fencing of the area.

The buses in question must be factory-built new, unused, fully functional, manufactured no earlier than 2025, coming from an official distribution channel in Poland or the European Union, not encumbered with any third-party rights. Buses cannot be displayed at sales points. They must be of the same model/type, the same version, have the same equipment and organization of the passenger space. The components, parts used, solutions and technical parameters must be the same in all buses delivered. The buses are to be delivered with additional equipment, authorization granted, necessary software, documentation and training. The ordering party will consider that a brand new vehicle will also be a vehicle which, due to the need to perform appropriate technical inspections, obtain appropriate approvals and transport to the ordering party, will have ....
